item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, January 22, 2025 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Ross Ulbricht granted a full pardon (386 points | 476 comments)
2. Stargate Project: SoftBank, OpenAI, Oracle, MGX to build data centers (419 points | 486 comments)
3. 0-click deanonymization attack targeting Signal, Discord, other platforms (1038 points | 356 comments)

5. Open-source browser port of Pitfall from the Atari 2600 (20 points | 4 comments)
6. Invisible Electrostatic Wall at 3M plant (1996) (293 points | 153 comments)
7. Isolating complexity is the essence of successful abstractions (14 points | 2 comments)
8. Calm tech certification "rewards" less distracting tech (212 points | 58 comments)
9. Castle Game Engine: Web target – big progress, first 3 demos to try (43 points | 8 comments)
10. Ask HN: Songwriters, what software do you use? (17 points | 10 comments)
11. The Peppermills of Jens Quistgaard (54 points | 32 comments)

14. Why Is Zero Plural? (16 points | 17 comments)

17. HyperDX (YC S22) is hiring engineers to build open source observability ( | hide)
18. Dissecting "Tiny Clouds" shadertoy (2017) (13 points | discuss)
19. Sigstore: Making sure your software is what it claims to be (51 points | 16 comments)
20. Prime numbers so memorable that people hunt for them (108 points | 63 comments)
21. Show HN: I made a app that uses NFC as a physical switch to block distractions (142 points | 90 comments)
22. Concept cells help your brain abstract information and build memories (86 points | 7 comments)
23. Evo: Version control that works the way you think (5 points | 4 comments)
24. Guided by the beauty of our test suite (84 points | 7 comments)
25. More than 40% of postdocs leave academia, study reveals (146 points | 175 comments)
26. Unconventional Adventures (29 points | 7 comments)
27. Liskov Substitution: The Real Meaning of Inheritance (23 points | 12 comments)
28. How to navigate and exit the idea maze (26 points | 1 comment)
29. How many Alpine packages can you install at once? (2024) (76 points | 26 comments)
